content.rendered:
AnadoluJet is a brand of Turkish Airlines operating as a regional airline. It operates domestic flights as well as flights to Northern Cyprus, Western Europe and the Middle East for its parent company.

The brand was created on 23 April 2008 by Turkish Airlines. In March 2020, the brand was reconfigured to apply to the entire Turkish Airlines international route network operating from Istanbul Sabiha Gökçen International Airport, consisting of over 20 routes.

AnadoluJet in Ankara, Turkey Contact Address, Phone, Email, Working hours and Website

Address: Ankara, Turkey

Phone number: 0850 333 2 538

FAX: NA

Email ID: NA

AnadoluJet Official website: https://www.anadolujet.com/en

AnadoluJet Online Check-in: https://online.anadolujet.com/checkin

Note: Check-in at the airport ends 60 minutes before the flight for domestic flights and 75 minutes before the flight for international flights.

Check AnadoluJet schedule here: https://online.anadolujet.com/schedule

Check AnadoluJet flight status here: https://online.anadolujet.com/online/kalkis-varis?lang=en-US

Types of Planes / Air craft available with AnadoluJet

Total fleet: 49

  • Boeing 737-800

AnadoluJet Baggage Allowance

View AnadoluJet Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in AnadoluJet

Traveling while Pregnant in AnadoluJet

  • The beginning of the 28th week to the end of the 35th week as long as they receive a report from their doctors stating “there is not any risk of traveling by plane”.
  • After thirty-six weeks, pregnant passengers are not allowed to travel, even if they receive a report from the doctor.

For more details: https://www.anadolujet.com/en/rules-and-conditions/passengers-with-special-needs

Traveling with Pets in AnadoluJet

  • Dogs and cats, or cats and birds may not be carried onto the same plane (whether or not they are in the same cabin).
  • Dogs and birds will be placed in separate cabins, or as far away as possible from one another.

For more details: https://www.anadolujet.com/en/rules-and-conditions/pet

Queries handled by AnadoluJet Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Miles & Smiles

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the AnadoluJet in Ankara, Turkey Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the AnadoluJet in Ankara, Turkey: (click on the stars below)
